## HttpResourcesServiceToolkit interface

Extended set of [OpenSearchDashboardsResponseFactory](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.opensearchDashboardsresponsefactory.md) helpers used to respond with HTML or JS resource.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HttpResourcesServiceToolkit 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [renderAnonymousCoreApp](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.httpresourcesservicetoolkit.renderanonymouscoreapp.md) | <code>(options?: HttpResourcesRenderOptions) =&gt; Promise&lt;IOpenSearchDashboardsResponse&gt;</code> | To respond with HTML page bootstrapping OpenSearchDashboards application without retrieving user-specific information. |
|  [renderCoreApp](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.httpresourcesservicetoolkit.rendercoreapp.md) | <code>(options?: HttpResourcesRenderOptions) =&gt; Promise&lt;IOpenSearchDashboardsResponse&gt;</code> | To respond with HTML page bootstrapping OpenSearchDashboards application. |
|  [renderHtml](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.httpresourcesservicetoolkit.renderhtml.md) | <code>(options: HttpResourcesResponseOptions) =&gt; IOpenSearchDashboardsResponse</code> | To respond with a custom HTML page. |
|  [renderJs](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-server.httpresourcesservicetoolkit.renderjs.md) | <code>(options: HttpResourcesResponseOptions) =&gt; IOpenSearchDashboardsResponse</code> | To respond with a custom JS script file. |
